properties.name: SubnetIds
properties.description: The identifiers of the subnets for the directory servers. The two subnets must be in different Availability Zones. AWS Directory Service specifies a directory server and a DNS server in each of these subnets.

type.description: The identifiers of the subnets for the directory servers. The two subnets must be in different Availability Zones. AWS Directory Service specifies a directory server and a DNS server in each of these subnets.

properties.name: VpcId
properties.description: The identifier of the VPC in which to create the directory.

type.description: The identifier of the VPC in which to create the directory.

properties.name: CreateAlias
properties.description: The name of the configuration set.

type.description: The name of the configuration set.

properties.name: EnableSso
properties.description: Whether to enable single sign-on for a Simple Active Directory in AWS.

type.description: Whether to enable single sign-on for a Simple Active Directory in AWS.

properties.name: Name
properties.description: The fully qualified domain name for the AWS Managed Simple AD directory.

type.description: The fully qualified domain name for the AWS Managed Simple AD directory.

properties.name: Password
properties.description: The password for the default administrative user named Admin.

type.description: The password for the default administrative user named Admin.

properties.name: ShortName
properties.description: The NetBIOS name for your domain.

type.description: The NetBIOS name for your domain.

properties.name: VpcSettings
properties.description: VPC settings of the Simple AD directory server in AWS.

type.description: VPC settings of the Simple AD directory server in AWS.

properties.name: DirectoryId
properties.description: The unique identifier for a directory.

type.description: The unique identifier for a directory.

properties.name: DnsIpAddresses
properties.description: The IP addresses of the DNS servers for the directory, such as [ "172.31.3.154", "172.31.63.203" ].

type.description: The IP addresses of the DNS servers for the directory, such as [ "172.31.3.154", "172.31.63.203" ].
